daily_take.headline: Maine Democrats Are Getting Serious About Platner's Senate Bid
daily_take.deck: Graham Platner's odds of becoming Maine's Democratic Senate nominee jumped 10 points overnight to 78.5%, signaling real momentum behind the candidate. The $1.1M in total volume shows this isn't chump change money, either. Maine's Senate race just found its frontrunner.
